医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
霹雳舞者因多年头部旋转受伤而被移除头皮肿块由于重复的头旋，霹雳舞者可能会在头皮上形成纤维团，称为头旋孔。最近的 BMJ 病例报告详细介绍了手术有效切除肿块、缓解症状的病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Breakdancere28099s-scalp-mass-removed-after-years-of-headspin-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Breakdancere28099s-scalp-mass-removed-after-years-of-headspin-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c44816a7-f38b-4637-9a3e-b8497d813c0f Mon, 14 Oct 2024 21:06:00 -0400 Breakdancer’s scalp mass removed after years of headspin injuries
差异基因表达与酒精使用障碍相关，提供新的治疗可能性研究人员发现了与成瘾相关的大脑区域的关键基因表达差异，这为酒精使用障碍和潜在的治疗靶点提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Differential-gene-express-linked-to-alcohol-use-disorder-offering-new-treatment-possibilities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Differential-gene-express-linked-to-alcohol-use-disorder-offering-new-treatment-possibilities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1ffdea3-8b6a-473e-ad10-b136dfa7d90e Mon, 14 Oct 2024 17:33:00 -0400 Differential gene expression linked to alcohol use disorder, offering new treatment possibilities
新的小瓶尺寸可以为医疗保险节省数百万美元的阿尔茨海默病药物费用新的研究表明，通过简单地引入新的小瓶尺寸，减少被丢弃的未使用药物的数量，医疗保险可以节省高达 74% 的因废弃阿尔茨海默氏症药物 Lecanemab 造成的损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/New-vial-size-could-save-Medicare-millions-on-Alzheimers-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/New-vial-size-could-save-Medicare-millions-on-Alzheimers-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15eafad9-3a59-4e3f-93f3-eaefa79f1a33 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 14:00:28 -0400 New vial size could save Medicare millions on Alzheimer's drug
密歇根大学获得 3000 万美元拨款用于增强遗传数据存储密歇根大学将大幅增加其大型 TOPMed 数据中心中存储的遗传信息的数量和类型，供世界各地寻求基因组治疗疾病的研究人员和医疗保健提供者使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/University-of-Michigan-receives-2430-million-grant-to-enhance-genic-data-storage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/University-of-Michigan-receives-2430-million-grant-to-enhance-genic-data-storage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d96dcc7-c5fb-4c67-8193-b9881059fb40 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 13:35:49 -0400 University of Michigan receives $30 million grant to enhance genetic data storage
宾夕法尼亚大学中国获得 650 万美元赠款用于社区健康解决方案宾夕法尼亚大学预防研究中心 (UPenn PRC) 已获得美国疾病控制与预防中心 (CDC) 五年内总计 650 万美元的拨款，用于与费城地区的社区合作开发、测试和评估解决方案公共卫生问题，特别是癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/UPenn-PRC-receives-2465-million-grant-for-community-health-solutions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/UPenn-PRC-receives-2465-million-grant-for-community-health-solutions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2d7f8d2-8a6f-413a-9c7c-fd827a37ae85 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 13:30:23 -0400 UPenn PRC receives $6.5 million grant for community health solutions
新的 EULAR 建议为系统性硬化症提供了更新的治疗策略SSc 是一种罕见的结缔组织疾病，具有自身免疫和血管特征。主要标志是组织和血管纤维化，可导致皮肤和内脏器官表现的临床异质性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/New-EULAR-recommendations-provide-updated-treatment-strategies-for-systemic-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/New-EULAR-recommendations-provide-updated-treatment-strategies-for-systemic-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa8fb1ee-8eb7-45f2-9bde-1b2947a90e62 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 13:22:00 -0400 New EULAR recommendations provide updated treatment strategies for systemic sclerosis
机器学习与统计方法相结合可以为疾病风险预测提供准确的模型北京大学的研究人员对机器学习与疾病风险预测模型统计方法的整合进行了全面系统的综述，揭示了这种整合模型在临床诊断和筛查实践中的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Combining-machine-learning-with-statistical-methods-can-provide-accurate-models-for-disease-risk-prediction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Combining-machine-learning-with-statistical-methods-can-provide-accurate-models-for-disease-risk-prediction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06f2d903-ac78-4101-a7d8-0f50a5876bbf Mon, 14 Oct 2024 13:06:34 -0400
研究发现与早发性先兆子痫相关的关键蛋白质先兆子痫是一种危及生命的妊娠并发症，以持续高血压为特征，在妊娠早期发生时情况更为严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Research-uncovers-key- Proteins-linked-to-early-onset-preeclampsia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Research-uncovers-key- Proteins-linked-to-early-onset-preeclampsia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afadadf7-6846-4de6-aff4-d08e8ba2a912 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 12:47:04 -0400 Research uncovers key proteins linked to early-onset preeclampsia
非医疗旁观者使用纳洛酮的人数有所增加，但速度不够快使用救生药物来扭转阿片类药物过量的情况正在增加，但速度还不够快。这是根据俄亥俄州立大学医学院、公共卫生学院和国家紧急医疗技术人员注册中心在 JAMA Network Open 上的最新研究得出的结论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Naloxone-use-by-non-medical-bystanders-on-the-rise-but-not-fast-enough.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Naloxone-use-by-non-medical-bystanders-on-the-rise-but-not-fast-enough.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb9401c1-496a-4e01-a568-6fe48d949f87 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 12:35:11 -0400 Naloxone use by non-medical bystanders on the rise, but not fast enough
探索人工智能在改变医疗诊断和治疗方面的作用2024 年 10 月 23 日星期三 1800 点在阿斯顿大学举行的 2024-25 年首次就职讲座将探讨人工智能 (AI) 如何彻底改变医疗保健提供者诊断、治疗和预防疾病的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Exploring-AIs-role-in-transforming-healthcare-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Exploring-AIs-role-in-transforming-healthcare-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ed4d015-e4d5-4769-9476-a8aacb5fbad7 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 12:25:19 -0400 Exploring AI's role in transforming healthcare diagnosis and treatment
